verbs.description: [V: Trump] either chose to hold himself apart from the other leaders or was exhausted .
[ARG0: Trump] either [V: chose] [ARG1: to hold himself apart from the other leaders] or was exhausted .
[ARG0: Trump] either chose to [V: hold] [ARG1: himself] [ARG2: apart from the other leaders] or was exhausted .
[ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-ADV: either] chose to hold himself apart from the other leaders or [V: was] [ARG2: exhausted] .
[ARG1: Trump] either chose to hold himself apart from the other leaders or was [V: exhausted] .
